title: Valentine’s Moonlight Movie Night at Kleinkaap Boutique Hotel
description: Whether you’re single, are married, in a relationship or just anti-Valentine’s Day, head to The Purple Horse in Alberton for one of their Murder Mystery Events taking place between 11 and 14 February 2023. Their popular Murder Mystery Dinners are plenty of fun and if you have not taken part in such an event before, don’t worry as the game and storyline is easy to follow! Should you attend this event, you can look forward to a 3 course meal and a bottle of “something-something” to enjoy! Book your tickets as soon as possible. If you would prefer to order a platter for 2 instead, pre-orders will be accepted. Tickets for The Murder Mystery Valentine’s Day on Saturday, 11 February are R325* per person. Your Character-detail will be given out with your RSVP response. Keep an eye on their Facebook page for updates on their dinners. more about the murder mystery dinner here.
location: Akanaka Blooms 136 Christine Rd, Homelands AH, MeyertonJohannesburg, 1961 South Africa
